name: RETRO VIRUS [ ZX Spectrum Next ]
description:
Prepare to face the threat of viral mutations across over 200 levels of BASIC programmed specialness (with a tiny bit of Z80 keyboard and sound handling).

We'll lead you in gently - the first three levels are a cinch.

Expect quirkiness, feistiness and something just a little different to anything you've played before.

Enjoy
